Lancaster seconds snatch draw in electric men's indoor hockey encounter

In a match of great intensity, Lancaster seconds snatched a 5-5 draw against York in the men's indoor hockey in front of a delirious crowd to share the Roses points

Outdoor Ultimate cruise to victory to secure Roses points

York's Ultimate Frisbee outdoors team ran out comprehensive 15-7 winners in style against Lancaster on day two of Roses 2013

Lancaster dominate women's rugby sevens firsts to take Roses points

The women's firsts suffered a comprehensive 35-5 defeat at the hands of a brutal Lancaster side on Friday in the final rugby sevens match of the tournament

Women's fencers stroll to comprehensive Roses win

The York women's fencing team sauntered to an easy 135-61 win over a lamentable Lancaster side on day two of Roses 2013 to secure four valuable points for the White Rose

Brave women's seconds fall to Lancaster in rugby sevens

The women's second team put in a performance full of spirit and passion as they fell 19-5 to a strong Lancaster side in the opening rugby fixture of Roses 2013

Immense Hilliam comeback clinches epic darts win

Kris Hilliam rallied from the precipice of defeat to clinch an emphatic 5-4 win for York in the Roses 2013 darts fixture on Saturday night

Emphatic York reclaim Roses trophy

York seized back the Roses trophy this weekend in style after completing a comprehensive 180.5 to 105.5 mauling of Lancaster

Passion, pride, and megaphones

By James Bithell

I was told by one particular fan on the sidelines that you never forget your first Roses. I think they were right

York edge netball barbarians clash

The highly anticipated college mix game saw the best of York pitted up against Lancaster, and they certainly didn't disappoint with a very strong performance

Mixed Ultimate team take first Friday points

The mixed Ultimate Frisbee team secured a dramatic Roses win on Friday afternoon

Rugby thirds thrash Lancaster

UYRUFC's 3rd XV put their opposition to the sword in the first of Saturday's two men's rugby fixtures

Late comeback in indoor women's hockey seconds

A superb comeback stunned Lancaster this afternoon as York Women's 2nds snatched a draw at the death in their Roses fixture

Bombers fight back to beat Centurions

Lancaster Bombers showed grit and determination to come back and beat York Centurions in the hotly anticipated Roses American Football match up

Second XV seal rugby whitewash

UYRUFC's second XV completed the men's rugby whitewash in a brutal contest on Saturday afternoon. York showed a great deal of composure and maturity to claim a 15-12 victory that was never assured until the final whistle

Men's Ultimate team fall to narrow indoor defeat

York's Mens Ultimate Frisbee players fell to a 6-5 defeat, after an energetic, closely fought match

Women's Ultimate win for Lancaster

York knew they were up against a strong team, having lost 9-4 in their match for Lancaster's Roses tournament last year

Efficient postgrads off to flying start

Well over 100 people descended upon the JLD to watch Wentworth seconds deservedly beat Derwent thirds in their first match of the College Cup 2013

Alcuin seconds hold off Langwith firsts resurgence

A stunning 30-yard free kick from Alcuin's Ben Carver was the highlight of the two sides opening fixture to the College Cup on a sun-baked JLD. Sam Woodall's assured finish in the second half secured a point for Langwith

There are 14 points on offer for tennis at Roses this year, York's teams will be looking to secure all 14 points for the white rose

As they gear up for a tough summer ahead of them, York's road cycling team and mountain biking team will be looking for a win at Roses to set up their season

A mixed season for York's basketball squads will have left them more determined than ever before to taste Roses victory this weekend

By James Bithell
